works.description:
Infringing websites are selling counterfeit products of my client's trademark "Moncler" 

Below URLs appear right next to original www.moncler.com in Google pages (.com, .it. and .fr) (query "moncler") and misleads Google users that are looking for genuine "Moncler" products.

The websites listed in this complaint are abusing the "Moncler" brand through the use of copyrighted images and logos, which are used to promote counterfeit goods on these sites. Neither of these sites are authorized to sell Moncler apparel or used any of the copyrighted images found at moncler.com

Please remove URL listed below to help Google users to find what they are looking for.
